unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Student Snacks
question_text:
At an elementary school, each child is given a snack pack consisting of one package of crackers and one bottle of juice.
Cracker packages have a mean weight of $6$ ounces with a standard deviation of $0.5$ ounces. Juice bottles have a mean weight of $16$ ounces with a standard deviation of $2$ ounces.
What are the mean and standard deviation of the snack packs?
